channel.title: Set proxy for kali virtual machine
channel.description: A virtual network card based on Kali host only mode，The Host ip is 192.168.42.1. Use `export http_proxy=http://192.168.42.1:1080` `curl -sL www.google.com`Have a response But ping does not work, it is said that ping is ICMP，but I don't know what the relationship is. Does openvpn support proxy ping tool through http？ Give me some ideas :咧着嘴笑:

item.title: Set proxy for kali virtual machine
item.dc:creator: system

This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

item.title: Set proxy for kali virtual machine
item.dc:creator: zhihuiyuze
item.description:
A virtual network card based on Kali host only mode，The Host ip is 192.168.42.1.
Use export http_proxy=http://192.168.42.1:1080
curl -sL www.google.comHave a response
But ping does not work, it is said that ping is ICMP，but I don’t know what the relationship is.
Does openvpn support proxy ping tool through http？
Give me some ideas :咧着嘴笑:

Read full topic
item.source: Set proxy for kali virtual machine
